metadata.title: Best Practice Company | AI that works
metadata.description: Best Practice Company helps organizations realize transformation by bringing AI from idea to production. From decision to production in 8-12 weeks.
metadata.keywords: AI implementation, digital transformation, AI consulting, AI production, enterprise AI, AI governance

hero.title: From AI ambition to production
hero.subtitle: in 8 to 12 weeks
hero.description: Best Practice Company helps organizations realize transformation by making AI work in daily practice. With measurable results and lasting control over security, compliance and ownership.

discovery.name: AI Value Discovery
discovery.question: Where is the most value?
discovery.description: No months of research, but a focused sprint that ends with choices. Where is the value? What is feasible? What do we do first?
deliverables: Top 5 use cases, prioritized by value and feasibility
Governance blueprint with roles and decision structure
90-day roadmap with at least 1 production-ready plan

delivery.name: AI Delivery Sprint
delivery.question: Who builds it and ensures it works?
delivery.description: From decision to working solution. We build, integrate, test and ensure adoption. The same people from start to finish.
deliverables: Working solution in production, including integration
Adoption plan and training for end users
Measurement plan with KPIs and baseline

continuity.name: AI Continuity
continuity.question: Who ensures adoption and development?
continuity.description: AI is not a project you complete. It's a capability you maintain. We deliver peace and control.
deliverables: Operating model: who does what, when

scenarios.situation: We want to start with AI but don't know where to begin
We know what we want, but who builds it?
We have AI running, but who keeps it alive?

foundation.title: Our foundation
foundation.description: Best Practice Company is at its core a transformation partner. Our experience lies in guiding and realizing complex changes where strategy, governance, technology and adoption come together.
foundation.expertise: We know how large organizations work, where people, processes and decision-making get stuck, and what it takes to make change actually happen.

distinction.title: Our distinction
points: Decades of experience in enterprise IT and cloud modernization
Deep operational expertise in finance, supply chain, manufacturing and HR
One small, senior team from strategy to production
Building within existing IT and cloud frameworks
Ownership with the client: data, code and models remain transferable

promise.title: Our promise
promise.description: We ensure AI and technology really work. As part of a transformation that people understand, use and continue to develop. With measurable results.

craftsmanship.name: Craftsmanship first
craftsmanship.description: We deliver quality, not rushed work. Every advice ends in a working solution.

results.name: Results over process
results.description: We don't sell hours, we sell working solutions. Less meetings, more building.

commitment.name: Lasting commitment
commitment.description: We build relationships, not just solutions. We stay until it works.

clarity.name: Clear and direct
clarity.description: We say what we mean. No jargon, no empty promises.

proof.title: What we've already put into production
examples: AI assistants actively used by hundreds of employees in financial and business services
Document classification processing thousands of documents per week for legal departments
Knowledge systems answering questions in seconds instead of hours
Agents preparing and substantiating decisions for management

approach.title: How we work
approach.total_time: Total: 8-12 weeks from start to production

phase1.name: Scope and validation
items: Understanding the use case and context

items.title: Benefit first, tooling follows
items.description: We start with the process and the result the organization wants to achieve.

items.title: Human in control
items.description: AI advises, people decide. Transparent systems that explain what they do.

items.title: Start small, prove fast
items.description: Rather live next month with one use case than next year with a big program.

items.title: Governance standard
items.description: Compliance, privacy, explainability – built in from day one.

data.title: Data and privacy
items: GDPR compliant: All solutions comply with the General Data Protection Regulation
European hosting: Data stays within the EU
Data ownership: You remain owner of all data

ai.title: AI-specific compliance
items: EU AI Act ready: Designed with the EU AI Act in mind
Transparency: AI decisions are explainable and traceable
Audit trail: Complete logging of what the AI does and why

ip.title: Intellectual property
items: Code is yours: All custom code is your property
Models are yours: Fine-tuned models and prompts stay with you
Transferable: Everything we build you can manage yourself
